de.kuei.scm.lotsizing.dynamic.stochastic.solver

Class StaticUncertaintySolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.kuei.scm.lotsizing.dynamic.stochastic.solver.AbstractStochasticLotSizingSolver
      • de.kuei.scm.lotsizing.dynamic.stochastic.solver.AbstractStochasticLotSizingDPSolver
        • de.kuei.scm.lotsizing.dynamic.stochastic.solver.StaticUncertaintySolver

  • public class StaticUncertaintySolver
extends AbstractStochasticLotSizingDPSolver
    This solver calculates the solution for a stochastic dynamic lot sizing solution with static uncertainty strategy as proposed by Bookbinder & Tan [1988] with the modified objective function proposed by Popp [2014].
    Author:
    Andi Popp

                              int setupPeriod,
                              int nextSetupPeriod,
                              double alpha)
                                   throws ConvolutionNotDefinedException
        Description copied from class: AbstractStochasticLotSizingDPSolver
        Calculates the decision to produce a lot to cover periods setupPeriod to nextSetupPeriod-1
        Specified by:
        getDecision in class AbstractStochasticLotSizingDPSolver
        Parameters:
        periods - The array of all the lot sizing periods wrapped in DPBackwardRecursionPeriods including the dummy period for the end of the planning horizon
        setupPeriod - The index of the setup period
        nextSetupPeriod - The index of the next setup period
        alpha - The target alpha service level
        Returns:
        the decision
        Throws:
        ConvolutionNotDefinedException - if the demand distribution cannot be convoluted efficiently
